title: A Sweet Tale
description: Mrs. Beaver got up early to make a special treat for the winter holiday. Will the beaver family get to eat a sweet treat? In A Sweet Tale, students will have the opportunity to sequence events as well as to ask and answer questions. Detailed illustrations and high-frequency words support emergent readers.
meta: chewing, dough, mixed, rolled, special, treat
